feedTitle: F-Droid - Free and Open Source Android App Repository
summary:
This Week in F-Droid

TWIF curated on Thursday, 19 Dec 2024, Week 51

Community News
DEfO ECH Apps, Experimental fork of F-Droid to use TLS ECH with Cloudflare as the default host, was updated to 0. 3 after two and a half years.  If the buzzwords in the summary tickle your network needs, you can give it a spin, but remember that it’s based on the older client code so it might miss some of the new niceties...
title: Message in a tunnel
